title.rendered: Qualified Remodeler’s Most Popular Products Highlights Eldorado Stone Wall Designs

content.rendered: Eldorado Stone’s Wall Designs have had the most views in recent weeks, earning a spotlight in the Most Popular Products section of the September 2014 issue of Qualified Remodeler. The article highlights Eldorado Stone’s options to incorporate stone into interior spaces with their four wall designs: The RusticWall, The StudyWall, The UrbanWall and The SeasideWall. With multiple color options for each wall, Eldorado Stone has found a way to transform the interior space of any home.
